ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hello I am new
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, don t ask for items. People will see that as begging. It is ok to ask for buffs very nicely. But asking for items is frowned upon. Wait until you get
ygData.messageBody:
Well, don't ask for items. People will see that as begging. It is ok to ask
for buffs very nicely. But asking for items is frowned upon. Wait until you
get some money from killing things and selling their loot and then offer to
buy things. And never be too aggressive about asking if someone will PL you.
It might make people want to avoid you. And don't be upset if people refuse.
Sometimes people just aren't in the mood to PL.
luv,
-Su

> Hey, well i guess i read more than i post, but i
> wanted to get this newbie some adivce:
> dont be afraid to ask for help. when i first started,
> i was terrified to ask any one for buffs or extra
> items, but you should. also, dont be afraid to ask
> anyone to pl you.
> Regards
> Charles Clavey
> "Sandaris"
> --- muaddib_1974 <muaddib1974@...> wrote:

> > to EverQuest. I am

> > David
